name: Dragon Gunner
description:
I created this small dragon shmup for the shmup jam 1

It is my first ever game in pico-8(a retro game engine) so it's not super great.

I used the theme by having the enemies be dragons, and the restriction by having 3 possible "upgrades" when you get a power up orb.

I hope you like it anyways, and devlog coming soon. :)

Made with love <3
